flawed_nl_solution:
5% of $2000 is (1/20)*$2000 = ${<<1/20*2000=40000>>}40000
After removing his transport fare, he will have $2000-$40000 = $-38000 left

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 40000. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
